short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: FluentPhone CRM Integration powered by FluentStream

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enjoy a seamless connection from your hosted phone system with FluentStream to nearly 100 different CRMs!  This allows for data-driven screen pops and click-to-dial to help you run and grow your business!  The app runs in the background and on inbound calls, launches your favorite CRM without logging in.  FluentPhone CRM supports multiple popular CRMs like SalesForce, HubSpot, Zoho and many more!
